top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave
Well this is the reimagining I have so wanted to see! I love the original of course, but I do so missed a rock/more intense version alongside. Glad I got my wish in one form or another 💜💜

Weird comment, but I have a crap tablet playing this through headphones instead of my pixel 3(it's charging), and your voice is so beautifully crystal clear, yet the instrumentals are absolutely shot as sacrifice. Still though, your voice has never sounded so clear. I wish I could explain it better because it made me hear this cover for the first time twice, and it was magical.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Every time you guys get together, it's fucking awesome! This was beautiful, deeply chilling, and just a touch moving, hats off to all of you!
Making out with a Chuckie doll is definitely one of the funniest things I've seen this week.
I don’t care that the drums weren’t in that one part we all know about… I still air drummed the crap out of them. Epic cover as always!
Holy mother of god violet your voice has become legend
Violet the new Bride of Chucky 😉😂😎

Słabe? Czy możesz wyjść z pustki z większą ilością prawdy?
Bo to jest nie wiadomo, czym? Jak to nazwać? Mając taki
talent i tak go marnować, tkwiąc w głupocie szkoda? Widzę coraz mniej pomysłów, a co za tym idzie gorsze wykonanie? Czy prawda tworzy świetne piosenki, do których zawsze lubisz wracać? Polecam, ją, aby stać się lepszym w muzyce i bardziej zawodnym w życiu? Na co dzień też?
You should do a cover of Repay, by The Plot in You.

It might be how the colors are reacting to the lighting, but with your hair and skin being aof simalar color and you wearing black, I'm reminded of nun; which only adds atmosphere and being ironic for using a pentacle.
There again, might be the lighting.
